original_text:
She will give you a garland to grace your head
    and present you with a glorious crown.”
korean_text: 그가 아름다운 관을 네 머리에 두겠고 영화로운 면류관을 네게 주리라 하셨느니라

sentences.original_text: She will give you a garland
and present you with a glorious crown
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 당신에게 영광스러운 면류관을 선물할 것입니다
